summary: Adds a standalone follower to Skyrim. Comes in CBBE and UNP
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bSbUh4k.png[/img]
[youtube]VndMXE0sNYY[/youtube]
[color=#cccccc][size=4]Big thanks to The New World for the video!
[/size][/color]
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#1e84cc][size=6]What is this?

[/size][/color][/font]This mod adds a standalone mage follower to your game.

[color=#1e84cc][size=6]Basic Information:

[/size][/color]Race: Nord
Name: Naarie
Voice: Sultry
Body Type: CBBE and UNP
Combat Style: Destruction mage, but can use conjuration spells.
Spells: Frostbite, Ice Spike, Ice Storm, Conjure Fire Atronach, Conjure Storm Atronach
Perks: Augmented Frost, Destruction Duel Casting, Destruction Adept
Default Equipment: Daedric dagger, Vaermina Robes
[color=#ffff00]Location: Dead Man's Drink in Falkreath

[/color][color=#1e84cc][size=6]Requirements:
[/size][/color]Skyrim Up to date

That's all.


[color=#1e84cc][size=6]Credits and thanks:
[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente - CBBE Body[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]Hellsanta- SG Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?]nerune2525 - Mikan Eyes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]HelloSanta - SG Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimon99 - UNP Body[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Expired - Racemenu[/url]

And thanks to Bethesda for providing us Skyrim and Nexus for hosting our mods. If I missed someone, I apologize! Just let me know!

[color=#3d85c6][size=5]Check out my other Mods:
